record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - July 11, 2007)

[Page: H7631]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on rollcall Nos. 616, 617, 618 and 619, I was unavoidably detained. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on all 4 rollcalls.
